Verses: 1 thiberiyuraayan Raajyabaaram Pannina Padhinaindhaam Varushaththile, Pondhiyupilaaththu Yoodheyaavukkuth Dhesaadhibadhiyaayum, Erodhu Kaarpangu Dhesamaagiya Galileyaavukku Adhipadhiyaayum, Avan Sagodharanaagiya Pilippu Kaarpangu Dhesamaagiya Iththureyaavukkum, Thiraakoniththi Naattirkum Adhipadhiyaayum, Visaaniyaa Kaarpangu Dhesamaagiya Abilenekku Adhipadhiyaayum,
2 annaavum Kaaibaavum Piradhaana Aasaariyaraayum Irundhakaalaththil Vanaandharaththile Sagariyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaanukku Dhevanudaiya Vaarththai Undaayitru.
3 appozhudhu: Karththarukku Vazhiyai Aayaththappaduththungal, Avarukkup Paadhaigalaich Sevvaippannungal Endrum,
4 pallangalellaam Nirappappatum, Sagala Malaigalum Kundrugalum Thaazhththappatum, Konalaanavaigal Sevvaiyaagum, Karadaanavaigal Samamaagum Endrum,
5 maamsamaana Yaavarum Dhevanudaiya Ratchippaikkaanbaargal Endrum, Vanaandharaththile Kooppidukiravanudaiya Saththam Undaakum Endru Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyin Aagamaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapiragaaram,
6 avan Yordhaan Nadhikku Arugaana Dhesamengum Poi, Paavamannippukkendru Manandhirumpudhalukketra Gnaanasnaanaththaik Kuriththup Pirasangiththaan.
7 avan, Thannidaththil Gnaanasnaanam Perumpadikkup Purappattuvandha Thiralaana Janangalai Nokki: Viriyanpaambukkuttikale! Varunkobaththukkuth Thappiththukkolla Ungalukku Vagai Kaattinavan Yaar?

8 manandhirumpudhalukku Etra Kanigalaik Kodungal; Aabiragaam Engalukkuth Thagappan Endru Ungalukkulle Sollaththodangaadhirungal; Dhevan Indhak Kallugalinaale Aabiragaamukkup Pillaigalai Undupanna Vallavaraayirukkiraar Endru Ungalukkuch Sollukiren.
9 ippozhudhe Kodariyaanadhu Marangalin Ver Aruge Vaiththirukkiradhu; Aagaiyaal Nalla Kanikodaadha Maramellaam Vettundu Akkiniyile Podappadum Endraan.
10 appozhudhu Janangal Avanai Nokki: Appadiyaanaal Naangal Enna Seyyavendum Endru Kettaargal.
11 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Irandu Angigalaiyudaiyavan Illaadhavanukkuk Kodukkakkadavan; Aagaaraththai Udaiyavanum Appadiye Seyyakkadavan Endraan.
12 aayakkaararum Gnaanasnaanam Peravandhu, Avanai Nokki: Podhagare, Naangal Enna Seyyavendum Endru Kettaargal.
13 adharku Avan: Ungalukku Kattalaiyittirukkiradharku Adhigamaai Ondrum Vaangaadhirungal Endraan.

14 porchchevagarum Avanai Nokki: Naangal Enna Seyyavendum Endru Kettaargal. Adharku Avan: Neengal Oruvarukkum Idukkanseyyaamalum Poiyaaik Kutranjaattaamalum, Ungal Sambalame Podhumendrum Irungal Endraan.
15 yovaanaikkuriththu: Ivandhaan Kiristhuvo Endru Janangalellaarum Ennangondu, Thangal Irudhayangalil Yosanaiyaayirukkaiyil,

16 yovaan Ellaarukkum Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Jalaththinaal Ungalukku Gnaanasnaanang Kodukkiren, Ennilum Vallavar Oruvar Varugiraar, Avarudaiya Paadharatchaigalin Vaarai Avizhkkiradharkum, Naan Paaththiran Alla, Avar Parisuththa Aaviyinaalum, Akkiniyinaalum Ungalukku Gnaanasnaanang Koduppaar.
17 thootrukkoodai Avar Kaiyilirukkiradhu, Avar Thamadhu Kalaththai Nandraai Vilakki, Kodhumaiyaith Thamadhu Kalanjiyaththil Serppaar; Padharaiyo Aviyaadha Akkiniyinaal Sutterippaar Endraan.
18 veru Anega Puththimadhigalaiyum Avan Janangalukkuch Sollip Pirasangiththaan.
19 kaarpangu Dhesaadhipadhiyaagiya Erodhu Than Sagodharanaana Pilippuvin Manaivi Erodhiyaalinimiththamaagavum, Thaan Seydha Matrap Pollaangugalinimiththamaagavum, Yovaanaale Kadindhukollappattapodhu,
20 thaan Seydha Matrellaap Pollaangugalum Thavira, Yovaanaiyum Kaavalil Adaiththuvaiththaan.
21 janangalellaarum Gnaanasnaanam Petrapodhu, Yesuvum Gnaanasnaanam Petru, Jebampannugaiyil, Vaanam Thirakkappattadhu;
22 parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Roopangondu Puraavaippol Avarmel Iranginaar. Vaanaththilirundhu Oru Saththamum Undaagi: Neer Ennudaiya Nesakumaaran, Ummil Piriyamaayirukkiren Endru Uraiththadhu.
23 appozhudhu Yesu Erakkuraiya Muppadhu Vayadhullavaraanaar. Avar Yoseppin Kumaaranendru Ennappattaar. Andha Yoseppu Eliyin Kumaaran.
24 eli Maaththaaththin Kumaaran; Maaththaadh Leviyin Kumaaran; Levi Melkiyin Kumaaran; Melki Yannaavin Kumaaran; Yannaa Yoseppin Kumaaran;
25 yoseppu Maththaththiyaavin Kumaaran; Maththaththiyaa Aamosin Kumaaran; Aamos Naakoomin Kumaaran; Naakoom Esliyin Kumaaran; Esli Nangaayin Kumaaran.
26 nangaai Maagaaththin Kumaaran; Maagaadh Maththaththiyaavin Kumaaran; Maththaththiyaa Semeyin Kumaaran; Semey Yoseppin Kumaaran; Yoseppu Yoodhaavin Kumaaran; Yoodhaa Yovannaavin Kumaaran;
27 yovannaa Resaavin Kumaaran; Resaa Sorobaabelin Kumaaran; Sorobaabel Salaaththiyelin Kumaaran; Salaaththiyel Neriyin Kumaaran.
28 neri Melgiyin Kumaaran; Melgi Aththiyin Kumaaran; Aththi Kosaamin Kumaaran; Kosaam Elmodhaamin Kumaaran; Elmodhaam Erin Kumaaran; Er Yoseyin Kumaaran.
29 yose Eliyesarin Kumaaran; Eliyesar Yoreemin Kumaaran; Yoreem Maaththaaththin Kumaaran; Maaththaadh Leviyin Kumaaran.
30 levi Simiyonin Kumaaran; Simiyon Yoodhaavin Kumaaran; Yoodhaa Yoseppin Kumaaran; Yoseppu Yonaanin Kumaaran; Yonaan Eliyaakkeemin Kumaaran.
31 eliyaakkeem Meleyaavin Kumaaran; Meleyaa Mayinaanin Kumaaran; Mayinaan Maaththaaththaavin Kumaaran; Maaththaaththaa Naaththaanin Kumaaran; Naaththaan Thaaveedhin Kumaaran.
32 thaaveedhu, Eesaayin Kumaaran; Eesaai Opedhin Kumaaran; Opedh Povaasin Kumaaran; Povaas Salmonin Kumaaran; Salmon Nagasonin Kumaaran.
33 nagason Amminadhaabin Kumaaran; Amminadhaap Aaraamin Kumaaran; Aaraam Esromin Kumaaran; Esrom Paaresin Kumaaran; Paares Yoodhaavin Kumaaran; Yoodhaa Yaakkopin Kumaaran.
34 yaakkobu Eesaakkin Kumaaran; Eesaakku Aabiragaamin Kumaaran; Aabiragaam Theraavin Kumaaran; Theraa Naagorin Kumaaran.
35 naagor Serookkin Kumaaran; Serook Rekoovin Kumaaran; Rekoo Pelekkin Kumaaran; Pelek Eperin Kumaaran; Eper Saalaavin Kumaaran.
36 saalaa Kaayinaanin Kumaaran; Kaayinaan Arppagasaaththin Kumaaran; Arppagasaadh Semin Kumaaran; Sem Novaavin Kumaaran; Novaa Laamekkin Kumaaran.
37 laamekku Meththoosalaavin Kumaaran; Meththoosalaa Enokkin Kumaaran; Enokku Yaaredhin Kumaaran; Yaaredh Magalaaleyelin Kumaaran; Magalaaleyel Kenaanin Kumaaran; Kenaan Enosin Kumaaran.
38 enos Seththin Kumaaran; Sedh Aadhaamin Kumaaran; Aadhaam Dhevanaal Undaanavan.
